title: BBC Local Live: Merseyside and west Cheshire on Monday 30 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: investigation finds 100 children went missing from care in wirral last year .
boy held over stabbing in birkenhead .
man killed outside liverpool gym died of gunshot wounds , police say .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates from merseyside and west cheshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on tuesday with the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the region .

documents.title: weather : turning cloudy with drizzle , but mild
text: it will turn increasingly cloudy through the night , preventing a frost from forming .
there 's likely to be a few outbreaks of drizzly light rain too .
minimum temperature : 5c .
tuesday will be a rather cloudy , grey and breezy start to the morning with some light rain and drizzle .
rain will become more persistent at times during the day , with some hill fog forming over higher ground like billenge hill .
maximum temperature : 10c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: shopkeeper by day , rocker by night
text: jon sharky worked in the music departments of high street chains for just over a decade , but always dreamed of owning his own shop .
a rock frontman by night in liverpool 's vibrant music scene , he saved up money to start his own business .
he has a tiny shop in liverpool 's quiggins mall for independent shops , but hopes to expand his operations .

documents.title: boy , 16 , arrested after cars set alight
text: a 16-year-old boy 's been arrested on sus of arson after a number of cars were set alight near liverpool cathedral .
two were set on fire in the gambier terrace area early on sunday morning , another four at about 03:00 this morning and three more were damaged a few hours later .
a 48-hour temporary dispersal zone came into effect at 17:00 to target anti-social and criminal behaviour .
it includes myrtle street , upper parliament street and princes avenue .

documents.title: breakingsunderland sign gibson & oviedo
text: breakingsunderland sign gibson & oviedo

documents.title: jaguar land rover extending halewood plant in £ 130m investment
text: jaguar land rover is investing £ 130m into its halewood plant - including an extension towards speke boulevard .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: breakingfootball : sunderland sign everton pair gibson & oviedo
text: sunderland have signed republic of ireland midfielder darron gibson and costa rica left-back bryan oviedo from everton .
oviedo , 26 , has agreed a contract until 2020 , while gibson , 29 , joins on an 18-month deal - both for undisclosed fees .
the pair have been fringe players under toffees boss ronald koeman this season .
sunderland 's david moyes has now signed three players this month - including joleon lescott - who he also signed when he was in charge at everton .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: three held after 'antique gun ' found at southport house
text: three men have been arrested after police recovered drugs and an antique firearm following a search by police in southport last night .
officers attempted to stop a vauxhall corsa on hesketh road at about 17:00 .
the car initially failed to stop and was followed before being stopped on nearby queens road .
bags of cannabis and a phone were found in the car and a furrther search of an address in sefton street , southport , found what was described as an antique handgun .
a 19-year-old man and two 20-year old men are being questioned on firearm and drugs offences .

documents.title: football : moyes keen to sign darron gibson & bryan oviedo from everton
text: sunderland manager david moyes is hoping to sign out-of-favour everton pair darron gibson and bryan oviedo before tuesday 's transfer deadline .
left-back oviedo , 26 , and 29-year-old midfielder gibson have been fringe figures under everton boss ronald koeman this season .
steven pienaar , victor anichebe and joleon lescott , who played under moyes when he was everton manager , have already moved to wearside this season .
author: Phil McNulty
BBC Sport chief football writer

documents.title: three arrested after imitation 'high-powered bb gun ' forund in anfield house bin
text: three men have been arrested and an imitation handgun has been recovered following an incident in liverpool last night .

officers in an unmarked car had followed a vehicle towards a house on breckside park , anfield and following a search of the premises found an imitation high-powered bb gun in a bag in a wheelie bin .
a 28-year-old man from anfield was arrested on sus of possessing a firearm without a certificate and possessing a firearm without a certificate .
a 19-year-old man from anfield and a 25-year-old man from forfar in scotland were both arrested on possessing an imitation firearm with intent to cause fear of violence .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: football fan cycles 10,667 miles to watch liverpool
text: meet the 24-year-old from south korea , who has cycled 10,667 miles ( 17,168km ) through 12 countries to see his beloved liverpool play at anfield .
jungyu lee left seoul on 10 june 2016 to start on his marathon journey to the uk .

he has passed though china , mongolia , russia , kazakhstan , estonia , latvia , lithuania , poland , czech republic , germany , netherlands to get to the uk - and is completing the last leg to liverpool today .
he said :
i am a keen liverpool fan and wanted to see the home ground and look for an opportunity to train as an assistant coach .
i am also quite adventurous person and there many places in the world i wanted to see , so going on my bicycle seemed a good way to see places and meet lots of people .

documents.title: police appeal after dash-cam captures city centre fight
text: police have appealed for information after a fight in liverpool city centr was captured on a dash-cam .
author: Liverpool Echo

documents.title: weather : cloudy and cool afternoon
text: becoming increasingly cloudy and feeling cool .
highs of 7c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: football : preston sign everton defender browning
text: everton defender tyias browning signs a new two-and-a-half-year deal and joins preston on loan .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: council 'hugely disappointed ' as southport regeneration plan rejected
text: sefton council leaders say they are hugely disappointed '' after the government rejected plans for a £ 1.5m scheme to regenerate lord street in southport .
author: Southport Visiter

documents.title: three arrested after drugs found in car in liverpool
text: three people have been arrested , after police found a large quantity of class a drugs during a stop and search in liverpool .
over 300 wraps of white and brown powder were recovered , when officers stopped a ford fiesta in speke last night .
a 32-year-old woman and 33-year-old man have been questioned on sus of drugs offences .
a 16-year-old boy was arrested on sus of obstructing a constable .

documents.title: roads : traffic light failure in liverpool
text: there is a traffic light failure on a580 townsend avenue in liverpool at the faversham road junction .
latest from bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: man taken to hospital after fire at home
text: a man was taken to hospital after fire broke out at his home in ellesmere port .
author: Wirral Globe

documents.title: football : southport sack steve burr after four months
text: southport sack manager steve burr after just over four months in charge with liam watson taking interim charge .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: lloyds bank to close down churchtown branch
text: churchtown is set to lose another of its banks this year as lloyds bank reveals plans to close down 200 of its high street branches , including one in churchtown village .
author: Southport Visiter

documents.title: cheshire police 'sniff out ' drug drivers
text: figures released by cheshire police show there is a growing number of people driving under the influence of drugs .
inside out north west 's jacey normand has been out with officers from the force as they try to combat offenders .
author: BBC Inside Out

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: fault leaves widnes residents without power
text: residents in part of widnes have been left without electricity , after a fault in the network .
scottish power says properties in cowan way , broad lane , greenway road and the surrounding area are all affected .
the firm has apologised , and says emergency response teams are on their way to restore the supply .

documents.title: football : moyes keen to sign gibson & oviedo
text: sunderland boss david moyes wants to sign out-of-favour everton pair darron gibson and bryan oviedo from his former club .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: liverpool man killed at meat market gym died of gunshot wounds
text: a man killed after going to a gym at a meat market died of gunshot wounds , a post mortem examination has found .
thomas baker was found badly injured at stanley meat market in the old swan area of liverpool on friday .
the 44-year-old from everton had been shot in the head and chest .
he died later in hospital .

documents.title: man and boy arrested over birkenhead stabbing
text: a 14-year-old boy and a 19-year-old man have been arrested over a stabbing outside yates wine bar in birkenhead on saturday night .
a 37-year-old man was found by emergency services outside the bar and is in a `` stable '' condition in hospital , police say .
the arrested pair are being held on sus of wounding .

documents.title: wirral sees sharp rise in number of missing children from care
text: one hundred children went missing from care in wirral last year - more than double the number in 2015 , the bbc has discovered .
many of the 570 incidents were due to 65 youngsters going missing at least twice , according to data released under the freedom of information ( foi ) act .
wirral 's director of children 's services julia hassall said `` intensive '' support is given to children in care .

documents.title: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire
text: latest headlines in merseyside and west cheshire

documents.title: weather : dry with some bright spells
text: partly cloudy and dry conditions will persist through the day , with some bright spells likely at times .
it will feel cool under any cloud with light winds .
highs of 7c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: hello from liverpool , i 'm here with all your news , sport , travel and weather updates from across merseyside and west cheshire today .
if you 've got a story you 'd like me to hear about or a photograph you 'd like to share , you can contact me on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Jenny Coleman
Reporter, BBC Local Live
